children.value: The 12nd of January we will conduct a drawing workshop on the thematics of World War II to discuss those important moments in history with a public of all ages. In partnership with the Resistance Museum of Lyon and the Sreet Art event

frontmatter.title: La Chute du Mur
frontmatter.subtitle: Street Art & Workshop
frontmatter.description: Workshop of the Live Drawing Project for the event "La Chute du Mur" at the resistance Museum in Lyon, France
